mapper.select: SELECT AB_NO AS abNo, ab_cg as abCg, ab_writer as abWriter, ab_Title as abTitle, ab_content as abContent, fileName, filePath, enroll_date as enrollDate FROM BOARD

SELECT AB_NO AS abNo, ab_cg as abCg, ab_writer as abWriter, ab_Title as abTitle, ab_content as abContent, fileName, filePath, enroll_date as enrollDate FROM (SELECT rOWNUM AS RNUM, N.*FROM (SELECT * FROM BOARD ORDER BY AB_NO DESC)N) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
